article:
My tire was flat. And I was on a country road. When I 36 _ with the tire, a car pulled off the road behind me. I saw a male 37 _ and said,"Hey, do you need any help?" 
I literally was 38 _ .This young guy was dressed in black. Nearly everything imaginable was tattooed  .When he asked to give me a 39 _ , I40 _ someone sitting in his car. That 41 _ me. Thoughts of robberies flashed through my mind. 
Then, it began to 42 _ .It hit like a waterfall and made it 43 _ to finish the tire change. With the car jacked   up, I was 44 _ to get in my car."Get in my car" he insisted,"We'll wait with you until the rain stops.""No. I don't need your help." I said."Come on. Get in." he said as he 45 _ my arm and pulled me toward his car."Oh, God, protect me!" I 46 _ to myself. 
As I settled into the back seat, suddenly a delicate47 _ came from the front seat of the car."Are you all right?" "Yes, I am," I replied with much 48 _ seeing an old woman there."My name is Beatrice and this is my neighbor John. John takes me to visit my husband in a nursing home every day. He is a really nice guy." 
"John, I had thought you were, well, ah, you know I..." Embarrassment 49 _ my words. John laughed, "I often experienced 50 _ reaction. I actually thought about changing the way I look.51 _ then I saw it as an opportunity to see others." 
He was right. What he wore outside was just a 52 _ of the world as he saw it, but what he wore 53 _ was the spirit of giving and caring the world he wanted to see. I never believed that I should 54 _ people by the way they dressed. I was 55 _ with myself for what I did. 
The rain stopped and John and I changed the tire. As we shook hands I apologized for my stupidity.
